programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: Feed me, Seymour! A florist’s assistant nurtures a carnivorous plant in this cult classic from Roger Corman.

programme.desc: Return to the outlaw days of the Old West with classics starring Clint Eastwood, John Wayne, and more.

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: A former Union soldier becomes a bounty hunter and vows to track down the racist thugs that murdered his mother.

programme.title: Best of the West Vol. 2
programme.desc: Saddle up as your favorite filmmakers talk beloved big screen Westerns!

programme.title: Clint Eastwood: Outlaw Spirit
programme.desc: From gunslingers to rebel heroes, Clint Eastwood brings grit, charm, and intensity in a way that no other movie star can.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Jane Russell sizzles on screen as Rio McDonald, a woman caught in the paths of Wild West legends Billy the Kid, Doc Holliday, and Pat Garrett. This 1943 blockbuster, directed by Howard Hughes, was famously controversial for its depiction of Russell, who became a sex symbol after its release.

programme.title: Gene Hackman's Greatest Hits
programme.desc: From "Bonnie and Clyde" to "The Royal Tenenbaums," these are the movies that made Gene Hackman a Hollywood legend.

programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers explore the revolutionary changes in 1960s cinema, where bold new voices and innovative techniques transformed the film industry.

programme.desc: Celebrate the iconic movies and unforgettable performances that defined the 1960s, leaving a lasting legacy on film history.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Here's how the films of the 1960s mirrored the decade's social and cultural upheavals, capturing the spirit of a transformative era.

programme.desc: Revisit the groundbreaking era of New Hollywood, where visionary directors redefined cinema with bold storytelling and innovative techniques.

programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers look back on the 1970s films that captivated audiences and became cult classics.

programme.desc: These are the films that thrilled a generation of moviegoers and defined the 1980s.

programme.desc: Journey through horror, sci-fi, and unforgettable adventures with this pulse-pounding collection of 80s blockbusters and cult classics.

programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers return to talk about 'Drive,' 'The Counselor,' and more 2000s hits.

programme.desc: Reckless experiments lead to monstrous results in these horrific Hollywood cult hits.

programme.title: The Future of Horror
programme.desc: In space, only the people sitting next to you can hear you scream. So scream loud!

programme.desc: TFH creator Joe Dante highlights Hollywood's atomic age paranoia and the nightmares unleashed on unsuspecting audiences.
